Package com.justinkleiber.focus2d.base

Package for interfacing with the hardware

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Audio
    Provides an interface for creating Audio
    Backdrop
    An interface for the FocusBackdrop class
    Clock
    Interface for keeping time
    Collision
    Interface for detecting Collisions
    Game  
    Graphics
    Provides an interface for drawing Graphics to the screen
    Input
    Interface for handling Input
    Music
    Interface for handling Music
    Pool.PoolObjectFactory<T>  
    SFX
    Interface for Sound Effects
    Sprite
    Defines the Sprite Object and its functions
    SpriteSheet
    Defines a SpriteSheet and its functions
    Storage
    Defines the File I/O functions
    Toaster
    Created by Justin on 6/9/2015.
    UI
    Defines the User Interface functions
    Vibrate
    Sets up the Vibrate functions
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Input.TouchEvent
    Enum that holds the codes for different TouchEvent types
    Pool<T>
    Class that deals with Sound Pools
    Position
    Class that defines an Object's position using coordinates
    Screen  
    SpriteStats
    This class is user customizable.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Graphics.ImageFormat
    Enum that lists the 3 possible ImageFormats
